title: Is there any proof that souls exist? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes, as a scientist there are many ways to prove the soul exists. It simply depends on what you define as “the soul.” Is it life? Then our being alive proves this. Is it consciousness? Then my awareness of your question proves this. Is it the extra dimensional aspects of the human body? Then quantum physics prove this as well. From a physics perspective, field theory could quantify a “soul” in that unifying forces compose the universe itself. Electrogravitics and magnetism have a great deal of influence on the physical world. If the brain is consciousness, then what is the soul for? It doesn’t necessarily have to be able to hold a conversation. From a biological perspective, morphic resonance fields explain a great deal of missing biological information. For instance, how is it remotely possible to simultaneously manage billions of chemical reactions each second in the human body? The nerves simply don’t reach them all, not even close. And what about the 37 trillion individually living cells? It’s not just a matter of making sure they are constantly supplied exactly the correct amount of ATP (adenosine triphosphate) for fuel and oxygen and they know when to divide exactly when is needed, except in cancer of course. But I don’t think you realise how impossibly amazing the cell division is. If it was +/- 0.1% in either direction, we would die from cancer very quickly or rapidly deteriorate. Cell division is somehow perfectly managed between those 37 trillion cells by… nothing. We have no idea what manages all of this. The best theory is that electromagnetic fields produced by the cardiovascular system coordinate this, with the pineal gland receiving far more blood than any area of the body (except the kidneys of course), so it is likely the sensory mechanism to know when to change with every heartbeat. And of course, everyone knows the first biologists called the pineal gland area the “seat of the soul.” That’s not even beginning to cover all the miracles of biology that we do not yet understand, like how DNA knows where to print each protein in these complex patterns. If you’ve ever used a 3d printer or sewing machine, you know how incredibly different knowing where to go is. It’s the difference between a really long string and a quilt, or a pile of plastic and a model. Is it the morphic field once again? Then how is this possible on a cellular level outside the body as has been replicated in lab? If you recall from the the Marvel movie Thor, one of the scientists was excited about the “soul forge” the norse gods used. They believe it repaired the soul, but she understood it by its scientific principals on Earth as a molecular energy transference device. I think scientists will be nonplussed when they discover what others may attribute to be a soul, if we ever can, since it theoretically would be extra dimensional in nature. For now, my advice is to be preoccupied in knowing thy self, for that is ultimately the soul you need to know best.
